name: I don't want to work overtime!
name_original: I don't want to work overtime!
description:
A game that scores as many points as possible in time

This is a game where you have to finish as much work as you can to avoid working overtime before work.

A game that scores as many points as possible in time.

Move-Left mouse click. (Click on the floor where you can move inside the map)

Accept Mission - Enter F key with corresponding angel and player in contact.

Most of them are completed with a click. Try a lot of things.

But the mission related to feathers and call has to wait after collision.
